main event: On the night of 29 January 1952, B-29 crews in Korea reported seeing glowingly orange globe-shaped objects while in flight, observed for periods of up to 5 minutes over a 30-mile area west-southwest of Wonsan.
interesting points: The object was seen by various B-29 crew members at different times from separate aircraft,The shape was described as globe-shaped with a slight teardrop effect and it sometimes changed to a bluish tint,The observers were World War II veterans, familiar with aircraft and battlefield phenomena,The sightings were reported under clear weather conditions,Observations indicated the objects may have been propelled rather than unguided.
witness description: B-29 aircrew members including tail, left, and top gunners
